text: <@U7SL518D6> Hi Jon. I have followed the steps in "HubSpot CMS Developers" course: in the "Setting up the local development tooling" step i use" npm install @HubSpot/cms-cli", i create the file .yml to push the project in my HubSpot account , but when i use "npx @HubSpot/create-cms-project agopec-theme" to create the project...it's created a empty folder.
<@U7SL518D6> issue solved: there was a policy problem. Now i can use "hs create website-theme theme-demo". Thank you

sorry about the inconvenience. Iâ€™ll be letting the academy team know they can update that instruction to have folks use the `hs` command directly to create a theme. (The video came out before that command existed)
